title: Chicken Curry with Green Pepper
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts, chopped (or can be left whole)', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and sliced', '2 tablespoons mild curry powder', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '600ml (1 pint) chicken stock', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'salt and pepper']
